name: dist_to_water
title: Distance to Water
description: Distance to water, measured in meters. Derived using World Vector Shorelines combined with rivers and lakes from World Data Bank 2 (via Natural Earth).

extract_types_info.mean: average distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum distance per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Wessel, P., and W. H. F. Smith, A Global Self-consistent, Hierarchical, High-resolution Shoreline Database, J. Geophys. Res., 101, #B4, pp. 8741-8743, 1996.
extras.sources_name: GSHHG: A Global Self-consistent, Hierarchical, High-resolution Geography Database
